Name: Dr Vanessa V Lawrence CB
Job/Team Function: Dr Vanessa V Lawrence CB, is the Director General and Chief Executive of Ordnance Survey, Great Britains national mapping agency. She also has Line Management responsibility for Corporate Affairs, Corporate Design and Publishing and External Communications.
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills

Name: Neil Ackroyd
Job/Team Function: Neil Ackroyd as the Director of Operations leads the organisation's gathering of information across Great Britain to maintain and update Ordnance Surveys digital mapping database.
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills

Name: 'N/D'
Job Title: Director of Finance and Corporate Services
Job/Team Function: The Director of Finance & Corporate Services is responsible for a range of services, including Finance, Procurement, Human Resources, Health and Safety, Facilities Management, Internal Communications, Legal and the Programme Delivery Unit.
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills

Name: 'N/D'
Job Title: Director of Sales and Market Development
Job/Team Function: The Director of Sales and Market Development is responsible for the sales and marketing of digital data and paper mapping.
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills

Name: 'N/D'
Job/Team Function: The Director of Products is responsible for all aspects of product management, including research and development, innovation, product marketing, engineering and supply.
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills

Name: 'N/D'
Job/Team Function: The Director of Information Services is responsible for Ordnance Survey's entire technology infrastructure. This includes our seamless database management system, which improves the speed and efficiency of how we handle and generate our geographic information.
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills
